trans-unit.source: More documentation about pyrana on this series of blog posts
trans-unit.target: More documentation about pyrana on this series of blog posts

trans-unit.source: Package for simple manipulation of multimedia files
trans-unit.target: 用于简单操作多媒体文件的软件包

trans-unit.source: Pyrana is a pure-python package which provides easy, pythonic and powerful handling of multimedia files.
trans-unit.target: Pyrana是一个纯粹的python包,它提供了简单、pythonic和强大的多媒体文件处理能力。

trans-unit.source: easy: pyrana does not submerge you with tons of options and details, but is filled with sane defaults. pyrana aims to be multimedia processing what requests is for http.
trans-unit.target: easy: pyrana does not submerge you with tons of options and details, but is filled with sane defaults. pyrana aims to be multimedia processing what requests is for http.

trans-unit.source: powerful: pyrana provides an independent API, but is built on the great foundations provided by the powerful FFMpeg libraries.
trans-unit.target: powerful: pyrana provides an independent API, but is built on the great foundations provided by the powerful FFMpeg libraries.

trans-unit.source: pyrana is a modern, pure python package which is developed for python 3 and compatible with python 2.7, which takes great advantage of CFFI, so the compatibility with pypy is just one step away.
trans-unit.target: pyrana is a modern, pure python package which is developed for python 3 and compatible with python 2.7, which takes great advantage of CFFI, so the compatibility with pypy is just one step away.

trans-unit.source: pyrana offers a minimum 100% unit-test and documentation coverage, and put great emphasis on small, yet complete and workable examples. Last but not least, pyrana is released under the very liberal ZLIB license.
trans-unit.target: pyrana提供了至少100%的单元测试和文档覆盖率,并且非常强调小而完整和可行的例子。最后但并非最不重要的是,pyrana是在非常自由的ZLIB许可证下发布的。

trans-unit.source: pythonic: pyrana wants to play nice and work well with the other well-established relevant python packages: Pillow, pygame, PySDL2, PyAudio, numpy compatibility is coming soon.
trans-unit.target: pythonic: pyrana wants to play nice and work well with the other well-established relevant python packages: Pillow, pygame, PySDL2, PyAudio, numpy compatibility is coming soon.
